remark.en: MST Program.Only students of the MST can take the course. Combine course: PHT032. Class time: Saturday 15:30-17:30, Classroom: Dr. Poe Lecture Hall, IAMS.  The actual class time will be set by the lecturer.
remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。與PHT032合班上課，六/15:30-17:30，中研院原分所浦大邦紀念講堂。實際上課時間，依任課老師規定。

goal.en: The purpose of this course is to listen to the lectures in frontier science to get more exposure and knowledge from the researches of variety of science divisions and to help the students to find out which direction he/she can devoted to.

content.en: "The students shall attend at least 8 sessions of the seminar, which held on Thursday, 3.30 p.m. at IAMS, according to his/her interest. Meanwhile, the teacher will appoint the students to attend another 5 specific lectures, at least."

grading.en: "You are requested to write a detailed report about the research of the lecture, which you are interested most. The attendance is counted in the evaluation, too and there will be roll call every lecture."
